title: Eastendbutchers Short Story Collection: Tales With Meat On The Bone
description: The Eastendbutcher has put together 25 great Short Stories in this wonderful collection. From the jaw-dropping "Bar Stool Preacher" to the mysterious final story of "Terry Palmer", all of them will have you turning the pages quicker than the Eastendbutcher himself can take the bones out of a Leg Of Lamb! Some will make you smile, some will make you laugh out loud and some will even make you cry. A real triumph of short storytelling.
author: Joe Lawrence
